about_the_game:
Features

  • Couch Multiplayer Chaos for 2-4 Players: Grab your friends for fast-paced local action in free for all or team battles!

  • Unleash Crazy Items to Take Control: Pick up and use quirky items to gain the upper hand. Knock the ball loose, KO opponents with a perfectly timed throw, and change the flow of the game.

  • Asymmetric Gameplay: Chase or be chased! The roles flip in an instant as players swap between running for the ball or escaping with it.

  • Unique Levels With Gimmicks: Each arena is packed with its own twists and challenges, testing your platforming and strategic thinking skills in new ways.

  • Steam remote play: Play with friends online through Steam Remote Play!

About the Game

Welcome to a fast-paced platformer sports game where quick reflexes and smart tactics are key. Race to capture totems, outplay opponents, and secure victory!

Dive into competitive couch multiplayer with Free-for-All and Team-based modes, where every match is fast, unpredictable, and action-packed!

Core Gameplay

This game is all about the thrill of chasing and escaping. When you're not holding the ball, hunt down the ball-holder. Once you have it, outmaneuver your opponents to capture totems and score points.

Scoring won’t be easy—your rivals will do everything to knock the ball from your hands. With constant shifts between offense and defense, the fast-paced gameplay rewards both strategy and skill.
